bhang: An astringent and narcotic drug made from the dried leaves and seed capsules of wild hemp Cannabis Indica and chewed or smoked in the East as a means of intoxication See Hasheesh
bheestie: A water carrier as to a household or a regiment India
bheesty: A water carrier as to a household or a regiment India
bhunder: An Indian monkey Macacus Rhesus protected by the Hindoos as sacred See Rhesus
